verses.kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:
verses.ct: My dear children, I'm writing this to you so that you won't sin. But if anyone does sin, we have someone who speaks to the Father on our behalf — Jesus Christ, the righteous one.

verses.kjv: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.
verses.ct: He is the atoning sacrifice for our sins, and not just for ours, but for the sins of the entire world.

verses.kjv: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.
verses.ct: Here is how we can be sure that we truly know him: by obeying his commands.

verses.kjv: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
verses.ct: Anyone who claims, 'I know him,' but doesn't follow his commands is a liar, and the truth has no place in that person.

verses.kjv: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.
verses.ct: But whoever obeys his message — in that person, God's love has truly reached its fullness. This is how we know we belong to him.

verses.kjv: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.
verses.ct: Anyone who claims to remain in him must live the same way he lived.

verses.kjv: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, I'm not giving you a new command but an old one that you've had from the very start. This old command is the message you heard from the beginning.

verses.kjv: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.
verses.ct: Yet at the same time, I am giving you a new command, and its reality is seen in him and in you, because the darkness is fading away and the true light is already shining.

verses.kjv: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.
verses.ct: Anyone who claims to be in the light but hates a fellow believer is still in darkness right now.

verses.kjv: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.
verses.ct: Whoever loves a fellow believer lives in the light, and there is nothing in that person that causes stumbling.

verses.kjv: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.
verses.ct: But whoever hates a fellow believer exists in darkness and walks around in darkness, not knowing where they're going, because the darkness has blinded their eyes.

verses.kjv: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name’s sake.
verses.ct: I'm writing to you, dear children, because your sins have been forgiven through his name.

verses.kjv: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.
verses.ct: I'm writing to you, fathers, because you have known the one who has existed from the beginning. I'm writing to you, young people, because you have defeated the evil one. I'm writing to you, children, because you have come to know the Father.

verses.kjv: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.
verses.ct: I have written to you, fathers, because you have known the one who has existed from the beginning. I have written to you, young people, because you are strong, God's word remains in you, and you have defeated the evil one.

verses.kjv: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
verses.ct: Don't love the world or anything in it. If anyone loves the world, the Father's love is not in that person.

verses.kjv: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.
verses.ct: Everything the world offers — the cravings of sinful nature, the craving for what we see, and arrogant pride in possessions — none of this comes from the Father. It all comes from the world.

verses.kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
verses.ct: The world and its cravings are fading away, but whoever does God's will lives forever.

verses.kjv: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.
verses.ct: Dear children, this is the final hour. You have heard that the antichrist is coming, and already many antichrists have appeared. This is how we know it is the final hour.

verses.kjv: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.
verses.ct: They left our community, but they never really belonged to us. If they had truly been part of us, they would have stayed with us. Their departure made it clear that none of them actually belonged to us.

verses.kjv: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.
verses.ct: But you have received an anointing from the Holy One, and all of you have knowledge.

verses.kjv: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
verses.ct: I'm not writing to you because you don't know the truth, but because you do know it, and because no lie has anything to do with the truth.

verses.kjv: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.
verses.ct: Who is the liar? It's the person who denies that Jesus is the Christ. That person is the antichrist — the one who rejects both the Father and the Son.

verses.kjv: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.
verses.ct: Whoever rejects the Son does not have the Father either. But whoever acknowledges the Son also has the Father.

verses.kjv: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.
verses.ct: So make sure that what you heard from the beginning stays rooted in you. If the message you heard from the start remains in you, then you will also remain in the Son and in the Father.

verses.kjv: And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.
verses.ct: And this is what he promised us: eternal life.

verses.kjv: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.
verses.ct: I've written these things to you about those who are trying to lead you astray.

verses.kjv: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
verses.ct: As for you, the anointing you received from him remains in you, and you don't need anyone else to teach you. Instead, his anointing instructs you about everything, and it is genuine — not a lie. So just as it has taught you, continue to remain in him.

verses.kjv: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
verses.ct: So now, dear children, remain in him, so that when he appears, we can be confident and not shrink back in shame at his coming.

verses.kjv: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.
verses.ct: Since you know that he is righteous, you can be sure that everyone who practices righteousness has been born of him.
